ComicInfo.Title: A Hand In It; Blood Type; A Crossroads Repetition
ComicInfo.Summary:
EVERY TOMBSTONE TELLS TELLS A TALE . . . THESE ARE YOUR EPITAPHS FROM THE ABYSS!
In your next infamous ish from the immortal EC Comics, all-new stories of fatalistic spectacle—told with wanton disregard for moral standards or public decency—from six ax-wielding masters of splatter de spectacular: rising star Chris Condon (That Texas Blood) and Eisner Award nominee Charlie Adlard (The Walking Dead); Hugo Award nominee Corinna Bechko (Invisible Republic) and Eisner Award winner Jonathan Case (Green River Killer); and Emmy Award winner Jay Stephens (Dwellings) and the maniacal Leomacs (Rogues)!
WARNING: Do not put this comic directly into your long box—it could leak blood onto your other back issues!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-24 18:05:54. [CVDB1070313]
ComicInfo.Writer: Chris Condon, Corinna Bechko, Jay Stephens
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Adlard, Dustin Weaver, Jonathan Case, Leomacs
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Adlard, Dustin Weaver, Jonathan Case, Leomacs
ComicInfo.Colorist: Charlie Adlard, Inaki Azpiazu, Jonathan Case
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bill Crabtree, Jay Stephens, Lee Bermejo, Rian Hughes, Tom Fowler
